data.message: I am officially un following and removing all his songs from my play list. No big loss really. Life goes on. He drew the line in the sand and let it be known he doesn't want me as a fan. Message received! 👍

replies.message: If you realize he doesn't care, what makes you think anyone else Does?

Yeah and I don't give a fuck either. Kinda the whole reason I said life goes on dumb fuck. Enough people follow his command and the line in the sand he might eventually give a fuck though. Just another irrelevant washed up entertainer trying to use political commentary to be relevant. Pretty pathetic actually lol

Ohhhhhhh gggggooooooddddddd.
Eminem has been dissing politicians since the Clinton administration. Shut the fuck up and change your tampon.

NExt time keep yo opinions to yo self

Nobody really cares

Mona doesn't give a fuck, but sure gave enough of a fuck to type out a message to let everyone know she doesn't give a fuck.

TL;DR Mona actually does give a fuck.

Ohhh u can say offensive shit to women just like your idol lmfao. Get the dick out of your ass. Why you so worried about me saying "Message received" that's what he said right? Drawing the line in the sand.....trump supporters could fuck off. What's the problem? I did exactly what he said to do. No biggie. So go suck his dick and you shut the fuck up. Your opinion of me is about as relevant as Eminem and his washed up career sweetheart. Keep it moving lol. Your boring me! 😴

I really don't know why all you losers are getting so butt hurt by my comment any damn way. I am doing exactly what the has been washed up white rapper said to do. My original comment didn't contain anythong offensive at all. I was merely pointing out that once again an entertainer is basically turning his back on thousands of fans because of their political beliefs. One thing should has nothing to do with the other. Just another person STILL boo hooing rhat their candidate didn't win. Seems to me like all of you including Eminem are a bunch of whiny children who can't admit defeat and cry when y'all don't get your way! Just add Eminem to the list of cry babies, alienating an entire population of people for exercising their rights and voting!
